theme: Debt management and fiscal sustainability,Public expenditure, financial management and procurement,Law reform

abstracts.cdata!:
Confronted by a large debt burden at the
            end of the 1990s, Brazil teamed with the IBRD and other
            financial specialists to craft a new approach to debt
            management that has not only yielded billions of dollars in
            savings in debt service payments, it also set a new
            foundation for economic strength that helped insulate Brazil
            from the severity of the global financial crisis. The
            savings that resulted from the IBRD supported reforms are
            being used to broaden and increase the quality of public
            services across Brazil.
